tags.name: umb-breadcrumbs
tags.description:
### Umbraco breadcrumbs 
 Use this directive to generate a list of breadcrumbs. 

 Usage: 

 ```html 
 <umb-breadcrumbs 
    ancestors='{array}' 
    entity-type='{string}' 
    [on-open='{callback}']>
</umb-breadcrumbs> 
 ```

attributes.name: entity-type
attributes.description:
The content entity type 

 Options: `content`, `media`, `member` 

 Type: `string`

attributes.name: on-open
attributes.description:
Function callback when an ancestor is clicked. This will override the default link behaviour. 

 Type: `callback function`

references.name: Umbraco API Docs V8 > Umbraco breadcrumbs directive `umbBreadcrumbs`
